method.name: Possibilistic Instance Based Learning

reference.ref: E. Hullermeier, Possibilistic instance-based learning, Artificial Intelligence, vol. 148, no. 1-2, pp. 335-383, 2003.

generalDescription.howWork: PosIBL is a nearest neighbor classifier based on Possibilistic theory. Distances computed between training instances and a new instance to be classified are weighted through a kernel function, dependent of the minimum distance of the training instance to its nearest enemy (the nearest training instance of a different class).

method.example:
Problem type: Classification Method: PosIBL-C Dataset: appendicitis Test Show results: Vis-Clas-Check Parameters: Default settings
After the execution of RunKeel.jar we can see into the Vis-Clas-Check results' file the classification results for the test set:
TEST RESULTS ============ Classifier= appendicitis Fold 0 : CORRECT=0.9090909090909091 N/C=0.0 Fold 1 : CORRECT=0.6363636363636364 N/C=0.0 Fold 2 : CORRECT=0.8181818181818181 N/C=0.0 Fold 3 : CORRECT=0.9090909090909091 N/C=0.0 Fold 4 : CORRECT=0.7272727272727273 N/C=0.0 Fold 5 : CORRECT=0.6363636363636364 N/C=0.0 Fold 6 : CORRECT=0.7 N/C=0.0 Fold 7 : CORRECT=0.8 N/C=0.0 Fold 8 : CORRECT=0.8 N/C=0.0 Fold 9 : CORRECT=1.0 N/C=0.0 Global Classification Error + N/C: 0.2063636363636364 stddev Global Classification Error + N/C: 0.11513915404148335 Correctly classified: 0.7936363636363636 Global N/C: 0.0
TRAIN RESULTS ============ Classifier= appendicitis Summary of data, Classifiers: appendicitis Fold 0 : CORRECT=0.8105263157894737 N/C=0.0 Fold 1 : CORRECT=0.8210526315789474 N/C=0.0 Fold 2 : CORRECT=0.8 N/C=0.0 Fold 3 : CORRECT=0.7789473684210526 N/C=0.0 Fold 4 : CORRECT=0.8 N/C=0.0 Fold 5 : CORRECT=0.8315789473684211 N/C=0.0 Fold 6 : CORRECT=0.8125 N/C=0.0 Fold 7 : CORRECT=0.8020833333333334 N/C=0.0 Fold 8 : CORRECT=0.8229166666666666 N/C=0.0 Fold 9 : CORRECT=0.78125 N/C=0.0 Global Classification Error + N/C: 0.19391447368421053 stddev Global Classification Error + N/C: 0.01631395083136566 Correctly classified: 0.8060855263157894 Global N/C: 0.0
